Exploration code, app OC lettings site

OC Lettings Site Views

Views

oc_lettings_site.views.index(request)[source]

Return the template named index.html which is the main index for application.

oc_lettings_site.views.handler404(request, exception)[source]

Return a custom 400 error HTML page.

oc_lettings_site.views.handler500()[source]
